Posts.EditableText:
Hi,

Haven't been here for a couple months. Been writing a game. Just uploaded it at the Publish page.

Yes, I know it's not very good. I'm afraid even the humor I was aiming for fell flat. 

In any case, I could have never done it without the help of you folks here on this site. Particularly want to thank Mr. Angel.

If you have time to look at it, I appreciate it.
Posts.HTML:
Hi,

Haven't been here for a couple months. Been writing a game. Just uploaded it at the Publish page.

Yes, I know it's not very good. I'm afraid even the humor I was aiming for fell flat.

In any case, I could have never done it without the help of you folks here on this site. Particularly want to thank Mr. Angel.

If you have time to look at it, I appreciate it.
